name: awesomeness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the ability to cause great admiration, respect, or fear: Science can show us the awesomeness of nature.
informal the quality of being extremely good or impressive: They're just jealous of your awesomeness. See
awesome
More examplesFewer examplesFor all the car's awesomeness, I cannot say that it is truly comfortable.What he lacks in stature and sheer awesomeness, he makes up for in heart.There's no denying the awesomeness of the gardens.
